name: My First Keepsake Notebook and Muslin Carrying Bag
description:
Hand crafted with care, this notebook is meant to store your child's first writings. The idea came from my niece who sat down to write me a letter in my handy notebook. She told me to not to read it until she was finished. I thought it was the sweetest thing, and immediately jotted down the date, her name and where we were at the time.

In a time when kids are texting and typing in their laptops, I thought this would be a great way to help them discover the art of writing, and the beauty of handwriting. It is also a great memento of their first writings. Each page has a space for you to write down the date, and place they were at when they wrote down their first scribbles. It might not seem like much now, but it will make for great memories when they grow up, and they grow up so fast. 

The notebook can be a keepsake for the child, or for the parents, grandparents, aunts and uncles in their lives. Choose from pre-filled tags stating, "a gift for my Mommy and Daddy", "a gift for Mommy and Mommy", "a gift for Daddy and Daddy", or "a gift for [ you fill in the blank]". Please state what you would like the tag to read when ordering.

5.5 x 7.5 inches, 42 pages all-together, lined sheets with the alphabet and numbers for your little one to practice their writing, and blank sheets with moon, star and sun to keep their first drawings. Layout and illustrations all done by me. 70 lb ultra white felt paper, textured hard cover in light yellow or light gray. Comes with handy hand painted muslin bag, drawing made with letters from the alphabet.

name: Good Luck "card" gift set
description:
This playful flat note card is linen paper on one side, with beautiful textured shimmering paper on the other. Fashioned after the Ace on a playing deck, send someone well wishes in a playful way. A job interview, a new job, let them know you are thinking of them and wish them well!

Set includes six flat 3 x 4.25 inches cards, in two patterns. Packed in a reusable muslin bag. Slip the note into a special someone's laptop bag, wallet, or pocket. Not to be mailed does not meet minimum size for postal service

name: My lips are sealed
description:
A personal note to make someone feel special.  The design features traditional sealing wax, hand produced by Scottish Artisans.  You can insert your own stationary or use the included linen paper delicately stating "WE".  

Flat note card, enveloped in luxurious 100% cotton printmakers paper.  3.5 x 4.875 inches.  Crane's Lettra 100% cotton envelope, in pearl white

name: LOVE "card"
description:
Send them your love. This playful flat note card is linen paper on one side, with velvety red paper on the other. Fashioned after the Two of Hearts on a playing deck. Tell your special someone you love them in a playful sexy way the velvet backing adds a certain spice to the touch...

3.5 x 5 inches, includes Crane's Lettra 100% cotton envelope in pearl.

name: Thank You card
description: Each card is individually hand crafted, the folded 100 % cotton printmakers paper is sealed with artisan made white sealing wax.  Each holds a flat note with a simple Thank you.
